item.title: [GROOVY-5705] STC: calling a closure stored in a property yields an NPE
item.description:
When you run the following example:

import groovy.transform.*

class Test {
    Closure c = { it }
    
    @TypeChecked
    void test() {
        c("123")
    }
}

new Test().test()
